ActivationProperties.description: The activation properties of the connected registry.

status.description: The activation status of the connected registry.

AzureADAuthenticationAsArmPolicy.description: The policy for using ARM audience token for a container registry.

status.description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.

CacheRulesListResult.description: The result of a request to list cache rules for a container registry.

nextLink.description: If provided, client must use NextLink URI to request next list of cache rules.

CacheRule.description: An object that represents a cache rule for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the cache rule.

CacheRuleProperties.description: The properties of a cache rule.

credentialSetResourceId.description: The ARM resource ID of the credential store which is associated with the cache rule.

targetRepository.description:
Target repository specified in docker pull command.
Eg: docker pull myregistry.azurecr.io/{targetRepository}:{tag}

creationDate.description: The creation date of the cache rule.

CacheRuleUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a cache rule.

properties.description: The properties of the cache rule update parameters.

CacheRuleUpdateProperties.description: The parameters for updating cache rule properties.

credentialSetResourceId.description: The ARM resource ID of the credential store which is associated with the Cache rule.

ConnectedRegistry.description: An object that represents a connected registry for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the connected registry.

ConnectedRegistryListResult.description: The result of a request to list connected registries for a container registry.

value.description: The list of connected registries. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of connected registries.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of connected registries.

ConnectedRegistryProperties.description: The properties of a connected registry.

mode.description: The mode of the connected registry resource that indicates the permissions of the registry.

version.description: The current version of ACR runtime on the connected registry.

connectionState.description: The current connection state of the connected registry.

lastActivityTime.description: The last activity time of the connected registry.

activation.description: The activation properties of the connected registry.

parent.description: The parent of the connected registry.

clientTokenIds.description: The list of the ACR token resource IDs used to authenticate clients to the connected registry.

loginServer.description: The login server properties of the connected registry.

logging.description: The logging properties of the connected registry.

statusDetails.description: The list of current statuses of the connected registry.

notificationsList.description: The list of notifications subscription information for the connected registry.

ConnectedRegistryUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a connected registry.

properties.description: The properties of the connected registry update parameters.

ConnectedRegistryUpdateProperties.description: The parameters for updating token properties.

syncProperties.description: The sync properties of the connected registry with its parent.

logging.description: The logging properties of the connected registry.

clientTokenIds.description: The list of the ACR token resource IDs used to authenticate clients to the connected registry.

notificationsList.description: The list of notifications subscription information for the connected registry.

GarbageCollectionProperties.description: The garbage collection properties of the connected registry.

enabled.description: Indicates whether garbage collection is enabled for the connected registry.

schedule.description: The cron expression indicating the schedule that the connected registry will run garbage collection.

LoggingProperties.description: The logging properties of the connected registry.

logLevel.description: The verbosity of logs persisted on the connected registry.

auditLogStatus.description: Indicates whether audit logs are enabled on the connected registry.

LoginServerProperties.description: The login server properties of the connected registry.

host.description: The host of the connected registry. Can be FQDN or IP.

tls.description: The TLS properties of the connected registry login server.

ParentProperties.description: The properties of the connected registry parent.

id.description: The resource ID of the parent to which the connected registry will be associated.

syncProperties.description: The sync properties of the connected registry with its parent.

CredentialSetListResult.description: The result of a request to list credential sets for a container registry.

value.description: The list of credential sets. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of credential sets.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of credential sets.

CredentialSet.description: An object that represents a credential set resource for a container registry.

identity.description: Identities associated with the resource. This is used to access the KeyVault secrets.

properties.description: The properties of the credential set.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description:
The list of user identities associated with the resource. The user identity 
dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: 
'/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/
    providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

CredentialSetProperties.description: The properties of a credential set resource.

loginServer.description: The credentials are stored for this upstream or login server.

authCredentials.description:
List of authentication credentials stored for an upstream.
Usually consists of a primary and an optional secondary credential.

creationDate.description: The creation date of credential store resource.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

location.description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

AuthCredential.description: Authentication credential stored for an upstream.

usernameSecretIdentifier.description: KeyVault Secret URI for accessing the username.

passwordSecretIdentifier.description: KeyVault Secret URI for accessing the password.

credentialHealth.description: This provides data pertaining to the health of the auth credential.

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags.

systemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

CredentialHealth.description: The health of the auth credential.

errorCode.description: Error code representing the health check error.

errorMessage.description: Descriptive message representing the health check error.

SystemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

CredentialSetUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a credential set

properties.description: The properties of the credential set update parameters

identity.description: Identities associated with the resource. This is used to access the KeyVault secrets.

CredentialSetUpdateProperties.description: The parameters for updating credential set properties.

authCredentials.description:
List of authentication credentials stored for an upstream.
Usually consists of a primary and an optional secondary credential.

targetTags.description: List of strings of the form repo[:tag]. When tag is omitted the source will be used (or 'latest' if source tag is also omitted).

untaggedTargetRepositories.description: List of strings of repository names to do a manifest only copy. No tag will be created.

mode.description: When Force, any existing target tags will be overwritten. When NoForce, any existing target tags will fail the operation before any copying begins.

resourceId.description: The resource identifier of the source Azure Container Registry.

registryUri.description: The address of the source registry (e.g. 'mcr.microsoft.com').

credentials.description: Credentials used when importing from a registry uri.

sourceImage.description:
Repository name of the source image.
Specify an image by repository ('hello-world'). This will use the 'latest' tag.
Specify an image by tag ('hello-world:latest').
Specify an image by sha256-based manifest digest ('hello-world@sha256:abc123').

username.description: The username to authenticate with the source registry.

password.description: The password used to authenticate with the source registry.

OperationListResult.description: The result of a request to list container registry operations.

value.description: The list of container registry operations. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of operations.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of container registry operations.

OperationDefinition.description: The definition of a container registry operation.

origin.description: The origin information of the container registry operation.

display.description: The display information for the container registry operation.

properties.description: The properties information for the container registry operation.

isDataAction.description:
This property indicates if the operation is an action or a data action
ref: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/role-based-access-control/role-definitions#management-and-data-operations

OperationDisplayDefinition.description: The display information for a container registry operation.

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

OperationPropertiesDefinition.description: The definition of Azure Monitoring properties.

serviceSpecification.description: The definition of Azure Monitoring service.

OperationServiceSpecificationDefinition.description: The definition of Azure Monitoring list.

metricSpecifications.description: A list of Azure Monitoring metrics definition.

logSpecifications.description: A list of Azure Monitoring log definitions.

OperationMetricSpecificationDefinition.description: The definition of Azure Monitoring metric.

OperationLogSpecificationDefinition.description: The definition of Azure Monitoring log.

RegistryNameCheckRequest.description: A request to check whether a container registry name is available.

name.description: The name of the container registry.

type.description: The resource type of the container registry. This field must be set to 'Microsoft.ContainerRegistry/registries'.

RegistryNameStatus.description: The result of a request to check the availability of a container registry name.

nameAvailable.description: The value that indicates whether the name is available.

reason.description: If any, the reason that the name is not available.

message.description: If any, the error message that provides more detail for the reason that the name is not available.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: The result of a request to list private endpoint connections for a container registry.

value.description: The list of private endpoint connections. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of private endpoint connections.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of private endpoint connections.

PrivateEndpointConnection.description: An object that represents a private endpoint connection for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionProperties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of private endpoint connection resource.

id.description: This is private endpoint resource created with Microsoft.Network resource provider.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The state of a private link service connection.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

description.description: The description for connection status. For example if connection is rejected it can indicate reason for rejection.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

RegistryListResult.description: The result of a request to list container registries.

value.description: The list of container registries. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of container registries.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of container registries.

Registry.description: An object that represents a container registry.

sku.description: The SKU of the container registry.

identity.description: The identity of the container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the container registry.

Sku.description: The SKU of a container registry.

name.description: The SKU name of the container registry. Required for registry creation.

tier.description: The SKU tier based on the SKU name.

RegistryProperties.description: The properties of a container registry.

loginServer.description: The URL that can be used to log into the container registry.

creationDate.description: The creation date of the container registry in ISO8601 format.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the container registry at the time the operation was called.

status.description: The status of the container registry at the time the operation was called.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled.

networkRuleSet.description: The network rule set for a container registry.

policies.description: The policies for a container registry.

encryption.description: The encryption settings of container registry.

dataEndpointEnabled.description: Enable a single data endpoint per region for serving data.

dataEndpointHostNames.description: List of host names that will serve data when dataEndpointEnabled is true.

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connections for a container registry.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the container registry.

networkRuleBypassOptions.description: Whether to allow trusted Azure services to access a network restricted registry.

zoneRedundancy.description: Whether or not zone redundancy is enabled for this container registry

anonymousPullEnabled.description: Enables registry-wide pull from unauthenticated clients.

Status.description: The status of an Azure resource at the time the operation was called.

displayStatus.description: The short label for the status.

message.description: The detailed message for the status, including alerts and error messages.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the status was changed to the current value.

StatusDetailProperties.description: The status detail properties of the connected registry.

type.description: The component of the connected registry corresponding to the status.

correlationId.description: The correlation ID of the status.

StorageAccountProperties.description: The properties of a storage account for a container registry. Only applicable to Classic SKU.

id.description: The resource ID of the storage account.

SyncProperties.description: The sync properties of the connected registry with its parent.

tokenId.description: The resource ID of the ACR token used to authenticate the connected registry to its parent during sync.

schedule.description: The cron expression indicating the schedule that the connected registry will sync with its parent.

syncWindow.description: The time window during which sync is enabled for each schedule occurrence. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

messageTtl.description: The period of time for which a message is available to sync before it is expired. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

lastSyncTime.description: The last time a sync occurred between the connected registry and its parent.

gatewayEndpoint.description: The gateway endpoint used by the connected registry to communicate with its parent.

SyncUpdateProperties.description: The parameters for updating the sync properties of the connected registry with its parent.

schedule.description: The cron expression indicating the schedule that the connected registry will sync with its parent.

syncWindow.description: The time window during which sync is enabled for each schedule occurrence. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

messageTtl.description: The period of time for which a message is available to sync before it is expired. Specify the duration using the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S as per ISO8601.

NetworkRuleSet.description: The network rule set for a container registry.

defaultAction.description: The default action of allow or deny when no other rules match.

Policies.description: The policies for a container registry.

quarantinePolicy.description: The quarantine policy for a container registry.

trustPolicy.description: The content trust policy for a container registry.

retentionPolicy.description: The retention policy for a container registry.

exportPolicy.description: The export policy for a container registry.

azureADAuthenticationAsArmPolicy.description: The policy for using ARM audience token for a container registry.

status.description: Indicates whether or not the encryption is enabled for container registry.

PackageType.description: The properties of a package type.

name.description: The name of the package type.

endpoint.description: The endpoint of the package type.

IPRule.description: IP rule with specific IP or IP range in CIDR format.

action.description: The action of IP ACL rule.

value.description: Specifies the IP or IP range in CIDR format. Only IPV4 address is allowed.

QuarantinePolicy.description: The quarantine policy for a container registry.

status.description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.

TrustPolicy.description: The content trust policy for a container registry.

status.description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.

RetentionPolicy.description: The retention policy for a container registry.

days.description: The number of days to retain an untagged manifest after which it gets purged.

lastUpdatedTime.description: The timestamp when the policy was last updated.

status.description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.

ExportPolicy.description: The export policy for a container registry.

status.description: The value that indicates whether the policy is enabled or not.

keyIdentifier.description: Key vault uri to access the encryption key.

versionedKeyIdentifier.description: The fully qualified key identifier that includes the version of the key that is actually used for encryption.

identity.description: The client id of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

keyRotationEnabled.description: Auto key rotation status for a CMK enabled registry.

lastKeyRotationTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the last successful key rotation.

RegistryUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a container registry.

identity.description: The identity of the container registry.

tags.description: The tags for the container registry.

sku.description: The SKU of the container registry.

properties.description: The properties that the container registry will be updated with.

RegistryPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a container registry.

adminUserEnabled.description: The value that indicates whether the admin user is enabled.

networkRuleSet.description: The network rule set for a container registry.

policies.description: The policies for a container registry.

encryption.description: The encryption settings of container registry.

dataEndpointEnabled.description: Enable a single data endpoint per region for serving data.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the container registry.

networkRuleBypassOptions.description: Whether to allow trusted Azure services to access a network restricted registry.

anonymousPullEnabled.description: Enables registry-wide pull from unauthenticated clients.

RegistryUsageListResult.description: The result of a request to get container registry quota usages.

value.description: The list of container registry quota usages.

RegistryUsage.description: The quota usage for a container registry.

currentValue.description: The current value of the usage.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: The result of a request to list private link resources for a container registry.

value.description: The list of private link resources. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of private link resources.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of private link resources.

PrivateLinkResource.description: A resource that supports private link capabilities.

type.description: The resource type is private link resource.

properties.description: A resource that supports private link capabilities.

PrivateLinkResourceProperties.description: The properties of a private link resource.

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.description: The private link resource Private link DNS zone name.

RegistryListCredentialsResult.description: The response from the ListCredentials operation.

username.description: The username for a container registry.

passwords.description: The list of passwords for a container registry.

RegistryPassword.description: The login password for the container registry.

RegenerateCredentialParameters.description: The parameters used to regenerate the login credential.

name.description: Specifies name of the password which should be regenerated -- password or password2.

ReplicationListResult.description: The result of a request to list replications for a container registry.

value.description: The list of replications. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of replications.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of replications.

Replication.description: An object that represents a replication for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the replication.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the replication at the time the operation was called.

status.description: The status of the replication at the time the operation was called.

regionEndpointEnabled.description: Specifies whether the replication's regional endpoint is enabled. Requests will not be routed to a replication whose regional endpoint is disabled, however its data will continue to be synced with other replications.

zoneRedundancy.description: Whether or not zone redundancy is enabled for this container registry replication

ReplicationUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a replication.

properties.description: The parameters for updating a replication's properties

regionEndpointEnabled.description: Specifies whether the replication's regional endpoint is enabled. Requests will not be routed to a replication whose regional endpoint is disabled, however its data will continue to be synced with other replications.

ScopeMapListResult.description: The result of a request to list scope maps for a container registry.

value.description: The list of scope maps. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of scope maps.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of scope maps.

ScopeMap.description: An object that represents a scope map for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the scope map.

ScopeMapProperties.description: The properties of a scope map.

description.description: The user friendly description of the scope map.

type.description: The type of the scope map. E.g. BuildIn scope map.

creationDate.description: The creation date of scope map.

actions.description:
The list of scoped permissions for registry artifacts.
E.g. repositories/repository-name/content/read,
repositories/repository-name/metadata/write

ScopeMapUpdateParameters.description: The properties for updating the scope map.

properties.description: The update parameters for scope map properties.

ScopeMapPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The update parameters for scope map properties.

description.description: The user friendly description of the scope map.

actions.description:
The list of scope permissions for registry artifacts.
E.g. repositories/repository-name/pull, 
repositories/repository-name/delete

TlsCertificateProperties.description: The TLS certificate properties of the connected registry login server.

location.description: Indicates the location of the certificates.

TlsProperties.description: The TLS properties of the connected registry login server.

status.description: Indicates whether HTTPS is enabled for the login server.

certificate.description: The certificate used to configure HTTPS for the login server.

TokenListResult.description: The result of a request to list tokens for a container registry.

value.description: The list of tokens. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of tokens.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of tokens.

Token.description: An object that represents a token for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the token.

creationDate.description: The creation date of scope map.

scopeMapId.description: The resource ID of the scope map to which the token will be associated with.

credentials.description: The credentials that can be used for authenticating the token.

status.description: The status of the token example enabled or disabled.

TokenCredentialsProperties.description: The properties of the credentials that can be used for authenticating the token.

ActiveDirectoryObject.description: The Active Directory Object that will be used for authenticating the token of a container registry.

objectId.description: The user/group/application object ID for Active Directory Object that will be used for authenticating the token of a container registry.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of user/group/application object Active Directory Object that will be used for authenticating the token of a container registry.

TokenCertificate.description: The properties of a certificate used for authenticating a token.

expiry.description: The expiry datetime of the certificate.

encodedPemCertificate.description: Base 64 encoded string of the public certificate1 in PEM format that will be used for authenticating the token.

TokenPassword.description: The password that will be used for authenticating the token of a container registry.

creationTime.description: The creation datetime of the password.

expiry.description: The expiry datetime of the password.

TokenUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a token.

properties.description: The properties of the token update parameters.

TokenUpdateProperties.description: The parameters for updating token properties.

scopeMapId.description: The resource ID of the scope map to which the token will be associated with.

status.description: The status of the token example enabled or disabled.

credentials.description: The credentials that can be used for authenticating the token.

GenerateCredentialsParameters.description: The parameters used to generate credentials for a specified token or user of a container registry.

tokenId.description: The resource ID of the token for which credentials have to be generated.

expiry.description: The expiry date of the generated credentials after which the credentials become invalid.

name.description: Specifies name of the password which should be regenerated if any -- password1 or password2.

GenerateCredentialsResult.description: The response from the GenerateCredentials operation.

username.description: The username for a container registry.

passwords.description: The list of passwords for a container registry.

WebhookListResult.description: The result of a request to list webhooks for a container registry.

value.description: The list of webhooks. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of webhooks.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of webhooks.

Webhook.description: An object that represents a webhook for a container registry.

properties.description: The properties of the webhook.

status.description: The status of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

scope.description: The scope of repositories where the event can be triggered. For example, 'foo:*' means events for all tags under repository 'foo'. 'foo:bar' means events for 'foo:bar' only. 'foo' is equivalent to 'foo:latest'. Empty means all events.

actions.description: The list of actions that trigger the webhook to post notifications.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

WebhookCreateParameters.description: The parameters for creating a webhook.

location.description: The location of the webhook. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

properties.description: The properties that the webhook will be created with.

WebhookPropertiesCreateParameters.description: The parameters for creating the properties of a webhook.

serviceUri.description: The service URI for the webhook to post notifications.

customHeaders.description: Custom headers that will be added to the webhook notifications.

status.description: The status of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

scope.description: The scope of repositories where the event can be triggered. For example, 'foo:*' means events for all tags under repository 'foo'. 'foo:bar' means events for 'foo:bar' only. 'foo' is equivalent to 'foo:latest'. Empty means all events.

actions.description: The list of actions that trigger the webhook to post notifications.

WebhookUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a webhook.

properties.description: The properties that the webhook will be updated with.

WebhookPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a webhook.

serviceUri.description: The service URI for the webhook to post notifications.

customHeaders.description: Custom headers that will be added to the webhook notifications.

status.description: The status of the webhook at the time the operation was called.

scope.description: The scope of repositories where the event can be triggered. For example, 'foo:*' means events for all tags under repository 'foo'. 'foo:bar' means events for 'foo:bar' only. 'foo' is equivalent to 'foo:latest'. Empty means all events.

actions.description: The list of actions that trigger the webhook to post notifications.

EventInfo.description: The basic information of an event.

EventListResult.description: The result of a request to list events for a webhook.

value.description: The list of events. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of events.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of events.

eventRequestMessage.description: The event request message sent to the service URI.

eventResponseMessage.description: The event response message received from the service URI.

EventRequestMessage.description: The event request message sent to the service URI.

content.description: The content of the event request message.

headers.description: The headers of the event request message.

method.description: The HTTP method used to send the event request message.

requestUri.description: The URI used to send the event request message.

EventResponseMessage.description: The event response message received from the service URI.

content.description: The content of the event response message.

headers.description: The headers of the event response message.

reasonPhrase.description: The reason phrase of the event response message.

statusCode.description: The status code of the event response message.

EventContent.description: The content of the event request message.

timestamp.description: The time at which the event occurred.

action.description: The action that encompasses the provided event.

request.description: The request that generated the event.

actor.description: The agent that initiated the event. For most situations, this could be from the authorization context of the request.

source.description: The registry node that generated the event. Put differently, while the actor initiates the event, the source generates it.

mediaType.description: The MIME type of the referenced object.

size.description: The number of bytes of the content. Same as Length field.

digest.description: The digest of the content, as defined by the Registry V2 HTTP API Specification.

length.description: The number of bytes of the content. Same as Size field.

url.description: The direct URL to the content.

Request.description: The request that generated the event.

id.description: The ID of the request that initiated the event.

addr.description: The IP or hostname and possibly port of the client connection that initiated the event. This is the RemoteAddr from the standard http request.

host.description: The externally accessible hostname of the registry instance, as specified by the http host header on incoming requests.

method.description: The request method that generated the event.

useragent.description: The user agent header of the request.

Actor.description: The agent that initiated the event. For most situations, this could be from the authorization context of the request.

name.description: The subject or username associated with the request context that generated the event.

Source.description: The registry node that generated the event. Put differently, while the actor initiates the event, the source generates it.

addr.description: The IP or hostname and the port of the registry node that generated the event. Generally, this will be resolved by os.Hostname() along with the running port.

instanceID.description: The running instance of an application. Changes after each restart.

CallbackConfig.description: The configuration of service URI and custom headers for the webhook.

serviceUri.description: The service URI for the webhook to post notifications.

customHeaders.description: Custom headers that will be added to the webhook notifications.

RegistryNameParameter.name: registryName
RegistryNameParameter.description: The name of the container registry.

ScopeMapNameParameter.name: scopeMapName
ScopeMapNameParameter.description: The name of the scope map.

PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

GroupNameParameter.name: groupName
GroupNameParameter.description: The name of the private link resource.

ConnectedRegistryNameParameter.name: connectedRegistryName
ConnectedRegistryNameParameter.description: The name of the connected registry.

ConnectedRegistryFilterParameter.name: $filter
ConnectedRegistryFilterParameter.description: An OData filter expression that describes a subset of connectedRegistries to return. The parameters that can be filtered are parent.id (the resource id of the connectedRegistry parent), mode, and connectionState. The supported operator is eq.

CredentialSetNameParameter.name: credentialSetName
CredentialSetNameParameter.description: The name of the credential set.

CacheRuleNameParameter.name: cacheRuleName
CacheRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the cache rule.
